definition: International Association of Athletics Federations (IAAF)/abbr. to 國際田聯|国际田联[Guo2 ji4 Tian2 Lian2]
pinyin: Guo2 ji4 Tian2 jing4 Lian2 he2 hui4

sentences.english: What about the other athletics events?
sentences.chinese: 其他的田徑項目怎麼樣？

sentences.english: Woodford is the linchpin of the british athletics team.
sentences.chinese: 伍德福是英國田徑隊中的關鍵人物。

sentences.english: Power is the basis of achievement of track and field.
sentences.chinese: 爆發力是多數田徑項目取得優異成績的素質基礎。

sentences.english: He was the head coach of the athletics team.
sentences.chinese: 他曾經是田徑隊的總教練。

sentences.english: In the 8th National Games the endurance events attract peoples attention among all track and field matches.
sentences.chinese: 八運會耐力項目在田徑項目比賽中是令人矚目的。

sentences.english: Track and field sprint is a typical speed of the physical class-based project.
sentences.chinese: 田徑短跑運動是典型的體能類速度型項目。

sentences.english: On the day of the race, Kathleen and Mark arrived at the track.
sentences.chinese: 賽跑當天，凱薩琳和馬克抵達田徑場跑道。

sentences.english: Research indicated that the modified rules presented higher demand in Athletic skills.
sentences.chinese: 研究表明，新規則提高了對田徑運動技術的難度要求。

sentences.english: Record fell one after another, especially in track and field.
sentences.chinese: 記錄一個接着一個地被打破，尤其是在田徑項目上。

sentences.english: The pole vault is one of the most complicated events in track and field.
sentences.chinese: 撐杆跳高是田徑項目中技術最爲複雜的項目之一。

sentences.english: The biggest story of the Berlin Olympics was American track-and-field star Jesse Owens.
sentences.chinese: 最大的故事柏林奧運會是美國田徑明星傑西歐文斯。

sentences.english: BMe too, but I think I prefer the athletics.
sentences.chinese: B我也是，但是我更喜歡田徑項目。

sentences.english: African athletes are good at track and field events.
sentences.chinese: 非洲選手擅長田徑項目。

sentences.english: A: Yes, I prefer gymnastics to track and field.
sentences.chinese: 是的，比起田徑項目來我更喜歡體操。

sentences.english: Joe and I are going to run in the race.
sentences.chinese: 喬和我打算參加田徑比賽。

sentences.english: Rule of Frack and Field Competition is the concomitant of Frack and Field Sports.
sentences.chinese: 田徑競賽規則是田徑運動的伴生物。

definition: sporting event/item on program of sports competition
